title: Meatballs in a rich tomato sauce (daoud basha)

ingredients.content: extra virgin olive oil, for greasing

preparations.content: Place minced beef, 1 tsp salt, pepper and cinnamon into mixing bowl and mix <b>10 sec/speed 3<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Grease Varoma dish and tray and set aside. With oiled hands shape reserved mince mixture into meatballs (Ø 2 cm) and distribute into Varoma dish and tray. Set Varoma aside.
Place onions, carrots and sunflower oil into mixing bowl, chop <b>3 sec/speed 4<b>, then remove measuring cup sauté <b>8 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.

Add crushed tomatoes, tomato purée, pomegranate molasses, 1 tsp salt and 100 g water, place Varoma into position and cook <b>25 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Meanwhile mix in a bowl cornflour and remaining 50 g water, stir with a spoon to dissolve.
Remove Varoma and transfer meatballs into mixing bowl with sauce. Add dissolved corn flour and cook <b>8 min/100°C//speed <b>. Serve immediately.
